text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡقُرُونَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ بَصَآئِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

translation.en: And We gave Moses the Scripture, after We had destroyed the former generations, as enlightenment for the people and guidance and mercy that they might be reminded
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah Kami berikan kepada Musa Kitab (Taurat) setelah Kami binasakan umat-umat terdahulu, untuk menjadi pelita bagi manusia dan petunjuk serta rahmat, agar mereka mendapat pelajaran
